Uses of Class
us.radiri.merc.audio.Audio

  • Packages that use Audio 
    Package Description
    us.radiri.merc.audio  

    • Uses of Audio in us.radiri.merc.audio

      Methods in us.radiri.merc.audio that return Audio 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Audio Audio.getAudio(IntBuffer buf)
      Makes a source based off of buf, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.
      Audio Audio.pause()
      Pauses the clip.
      Audio Audio.play()
      Plays the clip.
      Audio Audio.setLooping(boolean loop)
      Sets whether or not the clip should loop.
      Audio Audio.setPitch(float pit)
      Sets the pitch of the clip.
      Audio Audio.setVolume(float vol)
      Sets the volume of the clip.
      Audio Audio.stop()
      Stops the clip.
      Audio Audio.togglePause()
      Plays the clip if it is paused, pauses it if it is not paused.
      Audio Audio.toggleStop()
      Plays the clip if it is stopped, stops it if it is not stopped.
